title: Ryse Son of Rome Update 1 & 2 Hotfix-CODEX
description:
CODEX PRESENTS:

Ryse Son of Rome - Update 1 *Hotfix*
Release Date :  10/2014                        Protection : Steam
Discs        :  1                              Genre      : Action

Hotfix changelog:

- Fixed crashes on first game start on certain configurations
- Fixed save game issues

- Extract
- Run setup.exe and install update to your gamedir
- Copy crack from CODEX folder to your installdir
- Play

Notes: This patch requires: CODEX release of Ryse Son of Rome

Block game exe in your firewall to prevent the game from trying to go
online ..

=========================================================================

CODEX PRESENTS:

Ryse Son of Rome - Update 2 *Hotfix*
Release Date :  10/2014                        Protection : Steam
Discs        :  1                              Genre      : Action

Hotfix changelog:

- Fixed freezing cutscene in the "Pax Romana" level

- Extract
- Run setup.exe and install update to your gamedir
- Copy crack from CODEX folder to your installdir
- Play

Notes: This patch requires: CODEX release of Ryse Son of Rome
+ Ryse.Son.of.Rome.Update.1.Hotfix-CODEX

Block game exe in your firewall to prevent the game from trying to go
online ..
